answers.answer: Susan,Product information states that Effexor may have side effects such as dizziness and urinary frequency. However, these symptoms may also be due to medical conditions such as hypertension, diabetes mellitus, and urinary tract infection, to name a few. I urge you to consult your primary care physician for a thorough medical evaluation, and to discuss your concerns further with your treating physician/psychiatrist.

question: I have been taking effexor for approximately 6 weeks with no problems.  Lately, I have had to urinate frequently and have had morning dizziness that usually subsides after lunch.  Are these symptoms likely related to my effexor?  P.S.  i take my rx in the a.m. and with food.
title: effexor--morningdizziness
